content.html: If Monzo existed in the early 00s: - £1.99 on a happy meal just for the toy - payment to Blockbuster for your favourite dvds - buying the Crazy Frog ringtone - cinema tickets to see X-men 2 with Orange Wednesdays - Woolworths pick 'N' mix
content.value:
If Monzo existed in the early 00s:

- £1.99 on a happy meal just for the toy 
- payment to Blockbuster for your favourite dvds
- buying the Crazy Frog ringtone 
- cinema tickets to see X-men 2 with Orange Wednesdays 
- Woolworths pick 'N' mix
